name: LALA Hentai
description:
AboutLALA Hentai is an interesting and relaxing hentai puzzle game.
Cute and beautiful anime girls for every taste. Great musical accompaniment and juicy drawings 👯‍♀️
Features
💗 20 juicy beautiful anime girls.
💗 Great music and choice of soundtracks.
💗 Relaxing atmosphere.
💗 Ability to select the level of difficulty.
💗 35 Achievements.NotesAll characters in the game are over 18 years old.
